heroSlider3: Join us on a yacht journey around Ibiza’s stunning coastlines. Enjoy luxury, comfort, and the thrill of the sea all in one package.
aboutUs3: We specialize in all-inclusive yacht charters that combine luxury with adventure. Our experienced team ensures a safe and enjoyable experience from start to finish.
serives3: From beginner’s sailing tuition to luxurious accommodations and exhilarating windsurfing, our services are designed to cater to every adventurer's need.
serives9: Explore hidden gems and vibrant sunsets
serives11: Master the waves with top equipment.
readMore3: Explore the full range of our diving services. Get detailed information about sites, equipment, and safety protocols. Perfect for planning your next underwater adventure
showCase3: Explore our gallery to witness the unique blend of serene island escapes and the vibrant life captured during our guests' adventures in Ibiza.
testimonials3: Hear from our guests about their unforgettable yacht getaways. From family vacations to solo retreats, discover why many choose us for their escape.
description_text: Embark on a two-day yachting retreat, beginning with pick-up and transfer to the yacht, where you’ll spend a tranquil night.
sail_around: Set sail around Ibiza and Formentera.
lunch_and_activities: Have lunch onboard, then choose activities like snorkeling, Jet Skiing, or Parasailing.
dinner_and_sleep_in: Dinner and champagne in the evening, followed by the ‘Sleep In’ experience on the yacht.
wake_up_breakfast: Wake up to breakfast on the yacht.
explore_beaches: Spend the morning exploring Formentera’s beaches.
lunch_and_return: Lunch as we cruise back to Ibiza.
disembark: Disembark in the afternoon, rejuvenated from the journey.
indulge_description: INDULGE IN GOURMET SEAFOOD, EXPLORE NATURE’S WONDERS, AND CUSTOMIZE YOUR YACHT DREAM VOYAGE
custom_sea_break_text: Our Custom Sea Break Package in Ibiza offers a fully personalized yachting adventure, where we craft an initial proposal tailored to your preferences, but you’re completely free to customize it further.
base_price: BASE PRICE FOR A DAY: STARTING AT £340 PER PERSON
discount_for_bookings: *DISCOUNT FOR BOOKINGS WITH FEWER THAN 8 PASSANGERS
